DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the prognostic value of clinical and biological factors in patients with refractory/relapsed Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma.
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Value of Clinical and Biological Factors in Patients With Refractory/Relapsed Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: The main aim of this study is to compare the prognostic value of R-IPI at diagnosis and relapse, relating it with the obtained response after second line
DOC.criteria: Age 18 > years old Patients with refractory/relapsed diffuse large Bcell lymphoma after first line treatment with rituximab, with or without transplantation. Patients must have finished a rescue treatment including rituximab Ability to understand and willingness to sign a written informed consent
